channel.title: Py Humble Books
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Books bundles!

item.title: Become a Linux Master by Packt
item.description: Get comfortable with the command line
item.content:encoded: If you’re looking to advance your career in IT, security, and other thriving fields, a strong grasp of Linux is non-negotiable—this book bundle from Packt is here to help! Get a handle of the basics with Linux for System Administrators, which provides a primer for aspiring pros, as well as skill-boosts for helpdesk staff, support engineers, and others. The Linux DevOps Handbook will arm you with knowledge of essential tools like Docker and Git and upgrade your skills in command line and shell scripting. Mastering Linux Security and Hardening will equip sysadmins with the knowledge to prevent and detect malware infections, detect unauthorized network access, and more! Pay what you want for more than 20 books to help you achieve Linux mastery and support charity:water with your purchase!

item.title: Square Enix Manga Collection
item.description: A manga mosaic of friendship, love & life
item.content:encoded:
Discover tales of friendship, love, and the simple pleasures of life with this collection of manga from Square Enix. Witness the power of unexpected friendship in the heartwarming slice-of-life series My Clueless First Friend. Dive into the world of cosplay with the sweet and spicy rom-com My Dress-Up Darling. Savor the blend of delicious food and soulful comedy in the delectably touching Beauty and the Feast. Explore all these series and many more, and help support the Book Industry Charitable Foundation with your purchase!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.

item.title: Travel the World by National Geographic
item.content:encoded:
Give in to your wanderlust and prepare for a lifetime of unforgettable journeys with this bundle of books from National Geographic. This library of over 20 books is brimming with travel tips covering a variety of locales and topics, as well as the transportive imagery you expect from National Geographic. 50 States, 5,000 Ideas highlights interesting travel experiences in every U.S. state, from the obvious to the unexpected. Destinations of a Lifetime takes you on a photographic tour around some of the world’s most breathtaking locales, both natural and man-made. In Gordon Ramsay's Uncharted, you’ll join the legendary chef across some of the world’s most remote locations in search of culinary inspiration and human connection. Get all these books and much more, and help support First Book with your purchase!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.

item.title: Software Development by Pearson
item.description: Harness new ideas in software development
item.content:encoded: Learn all about the latest methodologies and technologies that are reshaping the world of software development with this book bundle from Pearson. In the Async-First Playbook, you’ll glean invaluable insights on remote-native, asynchronous work styles to prime your globe-spanning teams for success. Serverless as a Game Changer will teach you how to evolve your tech stack to deliver software faster, better, and at lower cost, backed up by real-world case studies. The latest edition of Software Architecture in Practice provides guidance on how to design, instantiate, analyze, manage, and evolve complex software projects, using the latest strategies and tech, like DevOps and quantum computing. Get all these books and more, and help support Women Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: The Cthulhu Casebooks of Sherlock Holmes
item.content:encoded: The adventures of the legendary sleuth Sherlock Holmes take a turn for the eldritch in this bundle of audiobooks from Blackstone Audio! You’ll get a host of novels and stories from New York Times best-selling author James Lovergrove featuring the world’s greatest detective, including the celebrated Cthulhu Casebooks series. Sherlock Holmes and the Shadwell Shadows invites you to delve into the heart of Victorian London's darkness, where Holmes and Watson confront a sinister force feeding on the city's despair. In Sherlock Holmes and the Miskatonic Monstrosities, the duo faces forgotten horrors from a scientist's past. Get all these stories and more, masterfully adapted as audiobooks, and help support FirstBook!

item.title: Pathfinder Second Edition Legacy Bundle by Paizo
item.content:encoded: Endless adventure awaits your RPG group with this Pathfinder 2nd Edition bundle from Paizo! Included are the Pathfinder 2nd Edition Core Rulebook and digital Beginner’s Box, as well as a bounty of sourcebooks, supplements, and adventure modules to keep your table busy for multiple campaigns’ worth of play. You’ll get three volumes of the Pathfinder Bestiary to keep the challenges fresh, numerous adventures like the beloved Crown of the Kobold King, and much more! Pay what you want for a lifetime of fuel for your RPG sessions and help support Comic Books for Kids with your purchase!

item.title: Machine Learning, AI, and Bots by O'Reilly
item.content:encoded: Delve deep into the realms of machine learning, AI, and bots with this bundle of books from O’Reilly! Inside this 14-book library, you’ll get expert insights on the tools and technology behind these cutting-edge fields. Learn about coding in Python or TensorFlow. Dig into designing deep learning systems. Level up your skills & knowledge whether you’re a novice or a seasoned prof, and help support Code for America with your purchase!

item.title: Directors, Filmmaking, and Hollywood Movies
item.content:encoded: Explore the work of the world’s most celebrated movies and moviemakers with this library of books! This 25-book collection puts the spotlight on visionary creators like Wes Anderson, Tim Burton, Bong Joon-ho, and Quentin Tarantino; delves into popular genres and Hollywood myths; and much more. Get lost in a library curated for cinephiles everywhere, and help support charity with your purchase!

item.title: Mike Mignola's Hellboy by Dark Horse
item.content:encoded: Follow Hellboy, the beloved sardonic antihero, into the vilest infernal depths and beyond in this jam-packed bundle of comics from Dark Horse! Witness the occult madness that brought the Right Hand of Doom to our world in Hellboy Volume 1: Seeds of Destruction. Go to the very depths of Hell alongside him in Hellboy in Hell Volume 1: The Descent. Feast your eyes on his dark allure in Hellboy: 25 Years of Covers. And more! Get your hands on over 30 books of Hellboy and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!
